attributes.action: Start a public enquiry into NHS Continuing Healthcare
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS Act is clear & the Coughlan Case stands as case law, but CCGs’ disregard for both forces people into nursing homes against their will and at their own expense. 
https://caretobedifferent.co.uk/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HrpFLLwGqhs
attributes.background: CHC funding is mismanaged by Clinical Commissioning Groups leaving families emotionally and financially devastated when they should be spending quality time with loved ones who, as enshrined in law, should have healthcare free at the point of delivery.
